snippets:
[
    // Type setting and Markdown
    {trigger: "bb", replacement: "**$0**$1", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "tt", replacement: "*$0*$1", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "yt", replacement: "`$0`$1", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "hq", replacement: "# ", options: "tAw"},
    {trigger: "hw", replacement: "## ", options: "tAw"},
    {
        trigger: "vb", 
        replacement: "```${0:pseudo}\n$1\n```\n$2", 
        options: "tAw"
    },

    // Callout boxes
    {
        trigger: "df", 
        replacement: "> [!definition]\n> $0", 
        options: "tAw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "nb", 
        replacement: "> [!note]\n> $0", 
        options: "tAw"
    },
    
    // Math mode
	{trigger: "ml", replacement: "$$0$$1", options: "Aw"},
	{trigger: "mm", replacement: "$$\n$0\n$$\n$1", options: "tAw"},
    {
        trigger: "aal",
        replacement: "$$\n\\begin{align*}\n$0\n\\end{align*}\n$$\n$1",
        options: "tAw"
    },

    // Math font changes
    {trigger: "bb", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}$1", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "ht", replacement: "\\hat{$0}$1", options: "Amw"},

    // Common math uses
    {trigger: "ff", replacement: "\\frac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "ds", replacement: "\\sum", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "ln", replacement: "\\ln", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "rt", replacement: "\\sqrt{${0:n}}}", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "pt", replacement: "\\partial", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "ell", replacement: "\\ell", options: "mA"},
    {
        trigger: "dnnt",
        replacement: "\\int_{${0:-\\infty}}^{${1:\\infty}}$2",
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {trigger: "nnt", replacement: "\\int", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "nf", replacement: "\\infty", options: "Amw"},
    {
        trigger: "lim", 
        replacement: "\\lim_{${0:n} \to ${1:\\infty}}",
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {trigger: "dr", replacement: "\\frac{d}{d${1:x}}$2", options: "Amw"},
    {
        trigger: "pdr", 
        replacement: "\\frac{\\partial}{\\partial${1:x}}$2", 
        options: "Amw"
    },

    // Set notation
    {trigger: "cup", replacement: "\\cup ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "cap", replacement: "\\cap ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "subs", replacement: "\\subset ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "sube", replacement: "\\subseteq ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "sups", replacement: "\\supset ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "in", replacement: "\\in ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "nin", replacement: "\\notin ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "est", replacement: "\\emptyset", options: "Amw"},

    // Probability
    {
        trigger: "PP", 
        replacement: "\\mathbb{P}\\left($0\\right)$1", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "EE", 
        replacement: "\\mathbb{E}\\left($0\\right)$1", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "cnd", 
        replacement: "\\mathbb{P}\\left($0|$1\\right)$2", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {trigger: "RR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "ZZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "NN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "sim", replacement: "\\sim", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "br", replacement: "\\bar ", options: "Amw"},
    {
        trigger: "ndd", 
        replacement: "\\mathbbm{1}(${1:i})$2", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "iid", 
        replacement: "\\overset{\\mathrm{iid}}{\\sim}", 
        options: "Amw"
    },

    // Shortcuts
    {trigger: "^n", replacement: "^{${0:2}}$1", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "_n", replacement: "_{${0:n}}$1", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "^^", replacement: "^2", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "__", replacement: "_0", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "==", replacement: "&=", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "ll", replacement: "\\\\\n", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "...", replacement: "\\cdots ", options: "Am"},
    {trigger: "dt", replacement: "\\cdot ", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "bx", replacement: "\\boxed{$0}$1", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "abx", replacement: "\\Aboxed{$0}$1", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "lft", replacement: "\\left", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "app", replacement: "\\approx", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "vc", replacement: "\\vec{$0}$1", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "rra", replacement: "\\rightarrow", options: "Amw"},
    {trigger: "llr", replacement: "\\leftarrow", options: "Amw"},
    {
        trigger: "\left(", 
        replacement: "\left($0\\right)$1", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "\left[", 
        replacement: "\left[$0\\right]$1", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "\left(", 
        replacement: "\left{$0\\right}$1", 
        options: "Amw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "cas",
        replacement: "\\begin{cases}\n${0:case} & ${1:value} \\\\\n${2:case} & ${3:value}\n\\end{cases}$4",
        options: "Amw"
    },

    // Greek letters
	{trigger: "apa", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ba", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "gmm", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Gmm", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "dla", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Dla", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "ep", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "za", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "tha", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Tha", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "kp", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "lda", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Lda", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "sg", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Sg", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "omg", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
	{trigger: "Omg", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "pi", replacement: "\\pi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Pi", replacement: "\\Pi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mu", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tau", replacement: "\\tau", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rho", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tta", replacement: "\\eta", options: "mA"},

    // Algorithms
    {trigger: "sst", replacement: "\\State ", options: "Aw"},
    {trigger: "llf", replacement: "\\ElsIf{$0}\n$1", options: "Aw"},
    {trigger: "cm", replacement: "\\Comment{$0}$1", options: "Aw"},
    {trigger: "rq", replacement: "\\Require{$0}$1", options: "Aw"},
    {
        trigger: "iff", 
        replacement: "\\If{$0}\n$1\n\\EndIf$2", 
        options: "Aw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "whl", 
        replacement: "\\While{$0}\n$1\n\\EndWhile$2", 
        options: "Aw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "ffr", 
        replacement: "\\For{$0}\n$1\n\\EndFor$2", 
        options: "Aw"
    },
    {
        trigger: "aag", 
        replacement: "```pseudo\n\\begin{algorithm}\n\\caption{${0:Name}}\n\\begin{algorithmic}\n$1 \n\\end{algorithmic}\n\\end{algorithm}\n```",
        options: "tAw"
    },

    // Text environment
    {trigger: "xt", replacement: "\\text{$0}$1", options: "mA"}
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, bigcup, bigcap
